verbs.description: [V: Pump] [ARG1: prices] for gasoline in Southern California have risen sharply in the last few months — reaching their highest level since mid-2015 — partly due to rising crude - oil prices , and there are fears oil prices could jump again if the Trump administration takes military action against Syria .
